Instruction: 'Tear the radicchio leaves into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large bowl.'
'Core the pear and slice it thinly.'
Add sliced pear, crumbled Gorgonzola cheese, and walnuts to the bowl with radicchio.'
In a small bowl, whisk together balsamic vinegar, olive oil, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.'
